message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $18,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  I'm happy to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still think the product is worth more to you than $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $14,000, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000.  This is my final offer, and if you're not interested, I'll have to go with John's offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $12,000. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, which is still a good compromise. What do you think?
